EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jan15 UK Activity Tracker
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the webinar. It will take place on January 22 at 2pm GMT. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the WebEx information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp_Activity_Tracker_Webinar.ics
http://www.intapp.com
